text: addēhaṁ paṟaññu: enṟe janaṅṅaḷē, niṅṅaḷ cinticciṭṭuṇṭēā? ñān enṟe rakṣitāviṅkal ninnuḷḷa vyaktamāya teḷivine avalambikkunnavanāyirikkukayuṁ, avanṟe pakkal ninnuḷḷa kāruṇyaṁ avanenikk nalkiyirikkukayumāṇeṅkil -allāhuvēāṭ ñān anusaraṇakkēṭ kāṇikkunna pakṣaṁ- avanṟe śikṣayil ninn (rakṣiccukeāṇṭ‌) enne sahāyikkānāruṇṭ‌? appēāḷ (kāryaṁ iṅṅaneyāṇeṅkil) niṅṅaḷ enikk kūṭutal naṣṭaṁ varuttivekkuka mātramē ceyyū
